snippet.title: Jacksmith: Weapons and Warriors
snippet.description: Fire up the forge and craft your finest weapons in Jacksmith: Weapons and Warriors, a reforged adventure!  As a determined donkey blacksmith, your journey takes you across the land — but treacherous monsters block the way.  Rally the local warrior clans and equip them with custom-crafted swords, bows, shields and more in a completely hands-on blacksmith shop.  Once your soldiers are armed, send them into battle to clear the path forward!  While the warriors fight, you'll gather loot and help out with your trusty cannon.  Collect better ores and parts to forge even stronger weapons, and keep honing your craft as you push onward toward the ultimate showdown with the evil wizard Dudley!
